name: Guilty Summer Kiss
description:
Guilty Summer Kiss is an addicting dating sim with beautiful characters and twists! You've met three lovely girls. And all three of them are so nice and attractive, that you just can't choose only one girl to date... Why choose then?

Cute dreamer, lively tomboy and calm smart student. They're so different, but you can always get on the right side of each girl. Show how skilled you're in the art of seduction. Grow closer to each girl and make all three of them fall in love with you. But be very careful and don't say too much - if at least one of the beauties finds out about your womanising nature, you'll feel the woman's wrath!
Get on this dangerous romantic path: keep track of your relationship and make sure that your love interests don't know about each other.
GET IN GOOD WITH THEMAsk the girls out and listen what they can tell you. Even the smallest details can be helpful! Earn their trust and they let you into their secrets.CAUTION COMES FIRSTBuild relationship, but always make sure that your girlfriends don't find out about each other.MULTIPLE ENDINGSHow is your risky romantic adventure gonna end? You won't know until you start it!


Guilty Summer Kiss is a short game that you can finish in a few hours. However, we've put our hearts and hard work into it, and we hope that players will enjoy it as much as we do.
